definitions.definition: A holder for ground espresso coffee that is attached to a group in an espresso machine to produce espresso.
A similar-shaped device but without a bottom opening, used to backflush or clean an espresso machine.

main_definition: A holder for ground espresso coffee that is attached to a group in an espresso machine to produce espresso.
secondary_definitions: A similar-shaped device but without a bottom opening, used to backflush or clean an espresso machine.
